name: sec.cyou
description: This repo is a catalogue of [DeFi](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Web3) platforms that facilitate permissionless and [KYC-free](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Know_your_customer) trading.

scripts.build:assets: mkdir -p public && cp -r dist/static/* public/ && cp -r src/assets/* public/assets/ && cp -r src/icons/* public/
scripts.build: npm run build:static && npm run build:server && node build && npm run build:assets

author: sec.cyou
